    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"

>
[Shift Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2731) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 75

**Access**
member of the Magaambya

**Requirements**
You have an active spell that affects an area and you are within the spell's range.

</column>

---

You move the spell's area to a new location within 120 feet. The spell's remaining duration is reduced by half. The spell no longer affects its previous area.
name: Shift Spell
requirement: You have an active spell that affects an area and you are within the spell's range.
